Game.Name: Cartoon Network Speedway (USA)
Game.plot: All of your favorite stars on Cartoon Network are revving their engines to compete for the Speedway Championship. Join the kart-racing action as one of 12 characters from Courage the Cowardly Dog; Cow and Chicken; Ed, Edd n Eddy; Johnny Bravo; and Sheep in the Big City. To maneuver around the obstacles in each course, you must use speed boosts, jumps, and power-ups to your advantage. Impress the audience with stunts to earn the highest popularity rating.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/918704.htmlCheat: All Five Championships WonEnter this in the password screen on the main menu.Cheat: All Five Championships WonEnter this in the password screen on the main menu.Cheat: All Five Championships WonEnter the following at the password screen on the main menu:Cheat: All Five Championships WonEnter this in the password screen on the main menu.Cheat: Unlockable CharactersTo unlock the following characters, Complete the following:Cheat: Unlockable CharactersTo unlock the following powerups, complete the following:Cheat: Unlockable CharactersTo unlock the following tracks, complete the following.Cheat: Unlockable CharactersTo unlock the following trophies, complete the following:
Game.Notes: All of your favorite Cartoon Network stars are revving their engines to compete for the Speedway Championship! Play as 12 hilarious characters from Courage the Cowardly Dog, Cow and Chicken, Ed, Edd n Eddy, Johnny Bravo and Sheep in the Big City in this fast and fun kart-style racing game.
